mapper.select: SELECT A.PRPSLID , A.CLSF_CD , A.TTL , A.CN , A.RLS_YN , A.PRCS_STTS_CD , A.FILEGRPID , A.REG_DT , A.USERID , B.NM FROM TB_CMM_ENV_EDU_PRPSL A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID WHERE PRPSLID = #{prpslid}
SELECT A.ANSID , A.PRPSLID , A.TTL , A.CN , B.NM , A.RLS_YN , A.ANS_DT FROM TB_CMM_ENV_EDU_PRPSL_ANS A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID WHERE A.PRPSLID = #{prpslid}

SELECT A.PRPSLID , A.CLSF_CD , A.TTL , A.CN , A.RLS_YN , A.PRCS_STTS_CD , A.REG_DT , A.USERID , B.NM FROM TB_CMM_ENV_EDU_PRPSL A INNER JOIN TB_CMM_USER B ON A.USERID = B.USERID WHERE A.DEL_YN != 'Y' AND A.USERID= #{user.userid}
AND A.TTL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
